-- | Connector package for integrating postgresql-orm with the Simple web framework
--   
--   Connector package for integrating postgresql-orm with the Simple web
--   framework
@package simple-postgresql-orm
@version 0.9.0.1

module Web.Simple.PostgreSQL
type PostgreSQLConn = Pool Connection
class HasPostgreSQL hs
postgreSQLConn :: HasPostgreSQL hs => hs -> PostgreSQLConn
createPostgreSQLConn :: IO PostgreSQLConn
withConnection :: HasPostgreSQL hs => (Connection -> Controller hs b) -> Controller hs b
instance HasPostgreSQL PostgreSQLConn
